verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: There's a new name newline Written down in glory, newline And it's mine. newline O yes, it's mine! newline And the white-robed newline Angels sing the story, newline "A sinner has come home."

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: For there's a new name newline Written down in glory, newline And it's mine, newline O yes it's mine. newline With my sins forgiven newline I am bound for heaven, newline Nevermore to roam.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I was once a sinner, but I came newline Pardon to receive from my Lord. newline This was freely given, and I found newline That He always kept His word.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I was humbly kneeling at the Cross, newline Fearing naught but God's angry frown, newline When the heavens opened and I saw newline That my name was written down.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In the Book 'tis written newline "Saved by grace." newline O the joy that came to my soul! newline Now I am forgiven and I know, newline By the blood I am made whole.
